title: The Wrath of Shadows
description: Fiss'Q, swordswoman and senator of the Republic of Arokhnai, finds herself mired in an assassination plot undertaken by the shadowy Smilers, intended to bring the city-state to the brink of war with one of its neighboring rivals. Will Fiss'Q uncover the conspirators in time to thwart the rush to a war that could be Arokhnai's undoing?Sagas of Irth Book 2
author: Dane Vale
